item.description:
Drawing in the Galleries
6:30 â€” 9 pm
Wednesday, June 9, 2010
Sharf Visitor Center

We did this meetup a little while ago and it was a lot of fun, even if you don't usually draw. Join us this Wednesday evening for an opportunity to sketch from live models and/or from objects in the MFA collections. A facilitator provides insights on drawing technique and the artist-model relationship as it informs the creation of artwork. Limited drawing materials are provided to encourage spontaneous participation.

If drawing is not for you, you can still come and tour an exhibit or two. We'll all meetup afterwards for coffee and dessert.

Wed. nights is "pay what you can". $5 is suggested. About this Meetup Group
Museum of FIne Arts, Boston
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me in the Visitor Center. I'll have an orange shirt.
item.name: MFA - Free Drawing and Free Exhibits
